org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue

Interface MessageQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, Iterable<M>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SynchronizedQueue<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryQueue, SingleLockQueue, SortedMemoryQueue

    public interface MessageQueue<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Iterable<M>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    Simple queue interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PERSISTENT_QUEUE 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(M item)
      Adds a single item to the implementing queue.
      void addAll(Iterable<M> col)
      Adds a whole Java Collection to the implementing queue.
      void addAll(MessageQueue<M> otherqueue)
      Adds the other queue to this queue.
      void addBundle(BSPMessageBundle<M> bundle)
      Adds the received bundle
      void clear()
      Clears all entries in the given queue.
      void close()
      Finally close the queue.
      void init(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, TaskAttemptID id)
      Used to initialize the queue.
      M poll()
      Polls for the next item in the queue (FIFO).
      int size()

      • poll

        M poll()
        Polls for the next item in the queue (FIFO).
        Returns:
        a new item or null if none are present.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        how many items are in the queue.
